If.condition: not ClassName == ClassJobType.Carpenter and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Blacksmith and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Armorer and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Goldsmith and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Leatherworker and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Weaver and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Alchemist and not ClassName == ClassJobType.Culinarian
